ParameterTypes.Name: ServerUrl
ParameterTypes.Description: The server endpoint for the provider

ParameterTypes.Name: UserName
ParameterTypes.Description: The user name for the provider

ParameterTypes.Name: ApiKey
ParameterTypes.Description: An API key for the provider

ParameterTypes.Name: MaxMessagesPerDay
ParameterTypes.Description: The maximum number of messages this provider will process, in a day
